entry.title: Israel, Hamas Agree to Extend Truce by Two Days
entry.content: Israel and Hamas agreed to a two-day extension of their truce in Gaza to allow for the release of more Israeli hostages as part of a fragile agreement that has brought respite from seven weeks of war.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What We Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.
